definitions.definition: The purified, dry form of an amine , especially an alkaloid natural product, that is normally used in solution.
The purified, dry form of certain illegal drugs, especially cocaine .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) The purified, dry form of an amine , especially an alkaloid natural product, that is normally used in solution.
secondary_definitions: ( specifically ) The purified, dry form of certain illegal drugs, especially cocaine .
